issue.title: [CF 377] Buff Icon "Stolen Power"/Reactive Icon "Kill Shot" appearing after zone change
issue.body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Entering a new zone via loadscreen.
2. Opening talent pane after logging in.
3. Switching specs

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?
The icons aren't supposed to show up, but they do for no reason.

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
4.7.1

Do you have an error log of what happened?
There is no runtime error.

Please provide any additional information below (including any export strings if applicable; see above.)

comments.body:
Quick update,

I managed to fix the problem I was having by deleting an old group I had made and wasn't using anymore. It was the "Cooldowns" group. I'm not sure if you can differentiate in the export string or not, but apparently that was causing my problem.

Thanks for the awesome addon.


> Posted by CurseForge user bsofdth

I'm still not sure why this would be happening, nor am I able to reproduce it, but at least you got it fixed.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
